page.title: 12Local Attractions: leisure
page.content:
{Evening Classes:} Pleckate School: a wide variety of evening leisure classes Mellor Community Centre floral art, pottery, keep-fit, painting etc. Mellor C E School (St Marys) keep-fit classes. Four Lane Ends cookery, dressmaking, floral art and some specialist evening classes.
{Local Attractions:} The Delf: a disused quarry, water- filled and deep. 'Chinatown': a cluster of streams; sewage works; cottages like pagodas; rainbow trout in the streams. The Tank: a high vantage point from which, on a clear day you can see for miles in every direction, a fascinating place.
